com.softwareag.natural.mapconverter.logger

Class MapconverterLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.softwareag.natural.mapconverter.logger.MapconverterLogger

  • public class MapconverterLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    Logger for writing Map Conversion log files. This logger uses the java logging classes.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1.2.3.2.5 $
    Author:
    zim

    • Method Detail

      • addConvItem

        public void addConvItem(int id,
                        int row,
                        int col,
                        java.lang.String itemName)
        Starts a new entry for a conversion item like fields, literals, grids, ....The id specifies the kind of item.
        Parameters:
        id - item identifier
        row - the row
        col - the column
        itemName - the name of the item
        See Also:
        ID_ITEM, ID_GRIDAREA, ID_GRIDHEADER, ID_SEQUENCEAREA

      • addConvItemRulename

        public void addConvItemRulename(java.lang.String name)
        Add the specified rule name to the current conversion item log entry.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the rule to log

        public void addGeneral()

        Returns the full filename of the logfile.
        Returns:
        the logfile name

        public java.lang.String getLogDir()
        Returns the full pathname of the directory of the logfile.

      • getLogger

        public java.util.logging.Logger getLogger()
        Returns the used java logging logger object.
        Returns:
        the java logger object

      • isError

        public boolean isError()
        Returns if an error was logged. This is the case if at least one log entry with severity lever Level.SEVERE has been added to the log.
        Returns:
        true if error false otherwise

      • isErrorLast

        public boolean isErrorLast()
        Returns if the last logged conversion item contains an error. This is the case if at least one log entry with severity lever Level.SEVERE has been added for the last item.
        Returns:
        true if error false otherwise

      • logConvItem

        public void logConvItem()
        Add the current conversion item log entry to the logfile.

      • logTrailer

        public void logTrailer()
        Adds a trailer to the logfile. The trailer contains information that the conversion is finished.
